text: Speaking to press after #EUTurkey Leaders' meeting on migration. Watch live: https://t.co/SmISeXHZSk. #EUCO https://t.co/wWDdjrpCJa
Despite good implementation of Joint Action Plan, flow of migrants from Turkey to Greece remains too high; needs to be brought down.
Days of irregular migration to Europe are over. Turkish PM confirmed Turkey takes back irregular migrants apprehended on Turkish waters.
I will work out details with Turkish side before March #EUCO. #migrationEU #EUTurkey
On media in Turkey: we cannot stay indifferent to concerns raised in this context. Freedom of speech & expression is a fundamental right.
We agreed to help #Greece: emergency support to the very difficult humanitarian situation on the ground will be provided urgently.
Turkey is committed to taking back migrants who do not int. need protection. Is concrete outcome that helps us further.
Turkey willing to do more: Davutoğlu's plan can be a very important step. Good news that we are working this out for #EUCO 17 March.
We continue to focus on a joint approach. In the meantime, also provide other filters. We need all the measures.
MinPres Statement after the EU-Turkey Summit → https://t.co/5IPsyiOqk8
